title: Find Ketheric Thorm's Relic
content: estern chamber of Gauntlet of Shar, he's been sent here to collect a Relic for Ketheric Thorm. You can temporarily work with him, and pass a persuasion check to get the item to summon his golem. Now you need to collect 4 Umbral Gems and reach the inner Sanctum. One Umbral Gem can be acquired by defeating Yurgir (Quest Kill Raphael's Old Enemy). He can be found in the east part of the temple.
